stimulusHtml: Which of the following scenarios best explains the inclusion of Title IX as part of the Education Amendments of 1972 ?
choicesHtml: Members of Congress added the amendment to the bill in response to social movements seeking to address inequality in education for women.
Paid lobbyists added the amendment on behalf of teachers unions in order to increase pay and tenure for public school teachers.
President Lyndon Johnson used the power of the bully pulpit to pressure members of Congress to pass a bill that would legally desegregate schools.
The Department of Justice added the amendment in order to provide legal guidance to states to enforce the Equal Rights Amendment.
